actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation and family fares and to authorize reduced-rate transportation for young people and for elderly people on a space-available basis.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Aviation Act of 1958, for the continuation of family fares and reduced-rate transportation for young people and for elderly people on a space-available basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 403 (b) of the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to permit the continuation and family fares and to authorize reduced-rate transportation for young people and for elderly people on a space-available basis.
